summary: Phase 1 progress: Fixed 1 sorry (createNewFamily_preserves_getFormulas), added helper lemmas (freshFutureTime_ne_current, freshPastTime_ne_current, wellFormed_mem_implies_famIdx_lt), refactored buildSeedAux_preserves_getFormulas to use general monotonicity lemma. Build passes with 11 sorries remaining in Phase 1 (down from 18).

partial_progress.details: Added helper infrastructure for membership preservation lemmas. Key remaining work: prove buildSeedAux_preserves_mem_general (monotonicity), which will resolve 9 of the remaining 11 sorries.
